review: its good, ig i'll finally be able to play somethin that isnt TF2 for a long while now, and thats a good fresh air

This is not the game you are looking for.

You will turn away from the page and install Team Fortress 2.

I've been playing Overwatch since it's 2016 Open Beta and after over 7 years I'm still having fun with this.
Of course there were some missteps, but the game still is the dumb fun with friends we know and love.
We still get new content, Maps, Characters and the amazing in-game Events still cycle through with more modes added every time.
Free to play changed the progression system, sure. But they gotta make money somehow and skins are only optional to begin with.
Legacy players got to keep all their stuff plus all their credits which they can still use to buy the new skins for free.
I had mixed feelings at the beginning. But at the end of the day free to play got more of my friends into the game. Worth it.
There's no pay to win and everyone plays under the same criteria. Cross-Play and Cross-Progression are also a huge bonus.
I'm very pleased with the Steam release. If you never played this before, ignore the review bombing and enjoy.
Bobby Codicks completely destroyed Blizzard.Due to a lack of commercial credit,Blizzard  will find it difficult to return to the Chinese market.

Overwatch 1.5
The changes from the first game for the second made the game, somehow, worse
Having a single player campaign behind a paywall is mocking the buyers from the first game
Plenty of problems with this one

doodoo, DLC dont get added bruh as the 16th president i can say this game is horribly managed

in all seriousness, dont get the game YET. if you are going to get OW2, just a friendly reminder to get in on battle.net for now. and before the OW2 mfs who keep pushing the "OMG TF2 WORSE THAN OW2!!!" bitches find out that i play TF2, no this isnt me hating on OW2 bc of TF2, but because OW2 in its current state is shit. If i want to talk on which is better, i'd make a post, not a review.

1. Overwatch 2's DLC will not be given to you if you are buying it on steam.
2. They pretty much attempt to pry open your wallet so you can buy their skins. 
3. Ximming, Smurfing, Etc.

It's.... It's Overwatch. I'm not a hardcore player but it is still refreshing to come back once in a while to play some general games. The only thing I did notice is that the PVE is locked behind a paywall and even the old ones still are. That's such a shame because the reason I got this game in the first place and pre-ordered it was because of the PVE.
installed the game just to review negatively

This game is the absolute worst thing out there. I'd rather watch paint dry. 1500+ hours and I have got nothing in return. Unless you plan to want to end your own life at the end of a game I suggest not playing this horrific piece of dogshit.
